Sustainability as seen in car adverts on YouTube

Today, most car brands prefer to use more subtle visual or narrative strategies to associate their models and image to the concept of sustainability in their adverts on YouTube. So, we analysed 90 different adverts with the intention to see through the recurring patterns and identify them.

Today, most car brands prefer to use more subtle visual or narrative strategies to associate their models and image to the concept of sustainability in their adverts on YouTube. So, we analysed 90 different adverts with the intention to see through the recurring patterns and identify them.

Automotifs puts on display these exact strategies by focusing on their peculiarities through supercuts and video collages.
